WFAPI::SymbianFactory

WFAPI::SymbianFactory Namespace Reference


Functions

MapLibNetworkContext * createHTTPContext ()

Detailed Description

Collection of factory methods which are used to construct the Symbian-specific classes needed to initialize MapLib.

Function Documentation

MapLibNetworkContext* WFAPI::SymbianFactory::createHTTPContext (  ) 

Creates and initializes a HTTP context which can be used by MapLib to download maps. Note that by calling this function you assume ownership of the resource and it must be kept alive for the duration of the MapLib session.

SymbianNativeDrawer* WFAPI::SymbianFactory::createNativeDrawer ( CCoeControl &  parent  ) 

Creates a Symbian specific map drawer using the supplied CCoeControl. Note that by calling this function you assume ownership of the resource and it must be kept alive for the duration of the MapLib session.

SymbianOpenGLESDrawer* WFAPI::SymbianFactory::createOpenGLESDrawer ( CCoeControl &  parent,
RWindow *  window 
)

Creates an OpenGL ES based renderer which works in a symbian environment. Note that by calling this function you assume ownership of the resource and it must be kept alive for the duration of the MapLib session.

ImageSpec* WFAPI::SymbianFactory::createSymbianImageSpec ( CFbsBitmap *  image,
CFbsBitmap *  mask 
)

Creates an image spec which can be used for overlay visuals.

Note that the internal image handles of image and mask will be duplicated, so it is safe to delete the image and mask once the method returns.

Initially the reference count of the ImageSpec resource is set to 1, so to properly deallocate it you will need to call removeReference() once you are done with the ImageSpec resouce.

MapLibAPI* WFAPI::SymbianFactory::createMapLib ( DBufConnection *  connection,
DrawingContext *  drawingContext,
const MapLibInitialConfig &  mapLibConfig 
)

Creates an instance of MapLibAPI using the supplied connection and drawingContext.
